summary: The contact owns a 2019 Kymco Like 150. The contact received notification of NHTSA Campaign Number: 20V350000 (Service Brakes, Hydraulic) however, the part to do the recall repair was unavailable. The contact stated that the manufacturer had exceeded a reasonable amount of time for the recall repair. The manufacturer was made aware of the issue. The contact stated that the speedometer, anti-lock braking system, and the odometer suddenly failed without warning. The approximate failure mileage was 250. VIN tool confirms parts are not available.
